alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 13 at 10:27AM CDT until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 20.8 Sat 9 am CDT 22.2 23.4 23.9 &&
